title: Jordan Wiseley and Johnny Bananas on Their Humanitarian Efforts in Ukraine | Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
Johnny recounts his experiences traveling through Poland and Ukraine and the humanitarian work he did there in collaboration with the organization Humanosh. He speaks with the people who reached out to him to come over and help, Jen Rubio and Scott Mitchell, about how they got involved and what they’ve seen of the crisis at the border. He also speaks with Polish doctor Kate Pikulska, who has worked on several humanitarian efforts with Humanosh, in Lviv. Then he welcomes Jordan Wiseley to the podcast to talk about how his impulsive trip to Poland to help out turned into becoming the UN-recognized humanitarian organization Foreign United Peoples NGO.
Here’s where you can donate to Humanosh to help them deliver life-saving shelter and supplies to refugees.
Here’s where you can donate to Jordan Wiseley’s NGO to deliver supplies to Ukraine and transport refugees to Poland.
Host: Johnny Bananas
Guests, Jordan Wiseley, Jen, Scott, Kate Pikulska
Producer: Sasha Ashall
Additional Production: Juliet Litman and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
